nodes.text: You can't hit the brakes in space

"You can't hit the brakes in space" is the fourth in a series of comics on the LEGO Star Wars website. It was first placed on LEGO's website autumn 2008 and then added to StarWars.com on October 20, 2009.
"Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano embark on a secret mission!"
"You can't hit the brakes in space…or can you?"

The comic begins with Anakin Skywalker and Ahsoka Tano setting of on a secret mission in the Twilight. In hyperspace, Anakin tells Ahsoka that they're going to Tatooine with an unpleasant cargo. Coming out of hyperspace, the Twilight is attacked by two MagnaGuard starfighters. Anakin destroys the fighters after putting his ship behind the two starfighters. After landing, it is revealed that the cargo is a baby Hutt. When the two Jedi aren't looking, the Hutt slips away. The Jedi desperately begin to look for the Hutt as it is seen leaving the ship behind them.
